Phases.Strategy: Move away from others when marked with Magitek Missile. Prioritize killing the adds when they spawn.

Mechanics.Name: Magitek Missle
Mechanics.Description: Targeted high-damage explosion on marked players.

Phases.Strategy: Take no actions or movement during Dynamic Sensory Jammer. Be ready with heals and AoE damage during Distress Beacon adds.

Mechanics.Name: Dynamic Sensory Jammer
Mechanics.Description: Damages the player for any actions they take while the debuff is active, including movement.

Mechanics.Name: Magitek Bit
Mechanics.Description: Summoned Bits around room create a checkerboard AoE before disappearing.

Mechanics.Name: Distress Beacon
Mechanics.Description: Summons many low-HP adds. Tank damage is significant due to quantity of adds.

Phases.Strategy: When The Griffin casts Lionshead, kill the sword in the middle and stand in the now-vacant space. Be ready to chase boss to avoid the cleave from Sanguine Blade. Turn around during Flash Powder, and be ready to break party members out of restraints.

Mechanics.Name: Flash Powder
Mechanics.Description: Turn away from boss to avoid Stun and Accuracy Down debuffs.

Mechanics.Name: Sanguine Blade
Mechanics.Description: Boss leaps to one side of the room and cleaves the room in front of him for high damage.

Mechanics.Name: Lionshead
Mechanics.Description: Swords rain down, damaging nearby players. After finishing cast, boss does room-wide AoE, and swords become targetable. Destroy large sword in middle.

Mechanics.Name: Big Foot
Mechanics.Description: Marks a player for a knockback

Mechanics.Name: Restraint Collar
Mechanics.Description: Restrains the healer, preventing all action. Kill restraints to release healer.
